sentences.cn: 整个世界变成了火葬的柴堆!

sentences.en: Faramir is lowered onto the pyre. A man's life hangs in the balance.
sentences.cn: 法拉墨落到柴堆上, 这人的生命垂危未定.

sentences.en: The glow of a funeral pyre slowly dies by the silent river.
sentences.cn: 火葬灰中的红光在沉静的河边慢慢地熄灭下去.

sentences.en: The Phoenix was said to build its funeral pyre out of myrrh, frankincense, and other spices.
sentences.cn: 凤凰(长生鸟)据说是用没药, 乳香和其他香料来建立火葬.

sentences.en: The two wicked sisters and the scorpion were burned on a pyre skyhigh.
sentences.cn: 两个狠毒的姐姐和刚生出来的蝎子,被拉到高高的木柴垛上烧死了.

sentences.en: The widow leapt into the funeral pyre.
sentences.cn: 这个寡妇跳进火葬柴堆.

sentences.en: Thunderbolts then fell from the sky and at once reduced the pyre to ashes.
sentences.cn: 接着,天打霹雳,柴堆立即化为灰烬.

trans.tran_cn: 大堆可燃物，（尤指火葬用的）柴堆
trans.tran_en: a high pile of wood on which a dead body is placed to be burned in a funeral ceremony
